item.title: Server sounds Rep++
item.dc:creator: @lostmyphat lostmyphat
item.description:
@lostmyphat wrote:

I followed this tutorial: http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,514356.msg3733866.html#msg3733866
Where else would I put the if((absX >=2626 && absX <=2687 && absY >=2630 && absY <=2687) && heightLevel == 0) { song = 125; } else { if((absX >=3520 && absX <=3590 && absY >=9659 && absY <=9731) || (absX >=3546 && absX <=3583 && absY >=3266 && absY <=3305)) { song = 349; } else { if(isInGraardor()) { outStream.createFrame(208); outStream.writeWordBigEndian_dup(197); sendQuest("@red@Wild", 199); song = 499; } else { if((absX >=2368 && absX <=2426 && absY >=5055 && absY <=5121))//JAD { song = 349; } else { if((absX >=3425 && absX <=3600 && absY >=3253 && absY <=3453))//Swamp { song = 337; } else { if((absX >=2799 && absX <=2875 && absY >=3321 && absY <=3393))//Entrana { song = 484; } else { if((absX >=2688 && absX <=2836 && absY >=2688 && absY <=2832))//ApeAtoll { song = 35; } else { if((absX >=2871 && absX <=2952 && absY >=4798 && absY <=4870))//Rune Essence { song = 325; } else { if((absX >=2443 && absX <=2490 && absY >=4802 && absY <=4859))//Law Altar { song = 355; } else { if((absX >=2181 && absX <=2233 && absY >=4812 && absY <=4862))//Death { song = 3; } else { if((absX >=3194 && absX <=3335 && absY >9250 && absY <=9409))//SmokeCave { song = 36; } else { if((absX >=3162 && absX <=3500 && absY >2857 && absY <=3200))//Desert { song = 36; } else { if((absX >=3469 && absX <=3520 && absY >=3461 && absY <=3516))//Canifis { song = 61; } else { if((absX >=3399 && absX <=3546 && absY >=3523 && absY <=3583))//Slayer Tower Music { song = 288; } else { song = 169; }}}}}}}}}}}}}} if(MusicOn == 1) { if(startedmusic == 0) { sM("Music started"); startedmusic = 1; } outStream.createFrame(74); outStream.writeWordBigEndian(song);//Canifis music } else { if(startedmusic == 1) { sM("Music stopped"); startedmusic = 0; } }
Other than process? Rep++ for answer.

Read full topic
